talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Geraint$
Is that dragon still in Passage of Broken Recollections?

$Geraint$
Is that dragon still in Passage of Broken Recollections?

$Geraint$
...Shall we go?(Geraint takes a deep breath. He seems to be preparing himself for his first attempt at apology... Go to the Passage of Broken Recollections.)

$Geraint$
Great, let's go there now.
(Go to the Passage of Broken Recollections)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
...You managed to drag him back here.(Rubinart's eyes look red)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_01.ogg}
But I still don't like that rascal who has no manners... I didn't have a rosy picture in my mind of an Ancient Dragon and a Chaos Dragon getting along anyway.

${user_nick}$
(Poke Geraint. Geraint reluctantly opens his mouth, with a sulky face as if he was asked to eat nutritious hound food…)

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9568_qu_01.ogg}
Please accept my… sincere apologies… Red Dragon Rubinart...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_02.ogg}
…?!?!?!??!?!
(Rubinart is so surprised that he jolts)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_03.ogg}
…Er... Erm... What??? What did he say?? Hey, say that again kid. Have my ears gone weird? Or did I go crazy after sleeping too much? Or are you two figments of my imagination?!

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9568_qu_02.ogg}
(He seems suprised by Rubinart's reaction too) Huh….?
H-hey what's with that reaction!! I gave you my sincere apologies!! You see? He doesn't get what I'm saying! I'm not going to do this again, ever!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_04.ogg}
What?! Did you really apologise...?
I really must have lived for too long... I never expected to receive an apology from an Ancient Dragon...(Rubinart still looks like he can't believe it)
Well, I admit I was a little harsh too after seeing an Argenta look-alike being too conceited...

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9568_qu_03.ogg}
Hah! You're weaker than Argenta, eh?(Geraint turns confident again)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_05.ogg}
What? Weak?!?! I was much stronger than her! I would have won a hundred times over if we fought.
It's just that… Argenta took a female form! So I naturally became considerate.
Don't you know such manners? Ladies first!!

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9568_qu_04.ogg}
Why is a Chaos Dragon minding manners?!?
You're really weird!!(Geraint glares and Rubinart with eyes full of distrust)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_06.ogg}
You're the one who's weird! Why are you acting like a kid? Just what was on your mind when you died? Really, I'm starting to look forward to you getting more mature like what {user_nick} said.

${user_nick}$
Excuse me, since the two of you made up with each other, can I ask what we should do next...?
Actually, I met Jasmine just now… (Tell them about your encounter with Jasmine in detail)

$Rubinart and Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9568_qu_05.ogg}
…From the future?????

${user_nick}$
(Er… Do I need to explain that too?! It's going to take forever, but explain to them one by one in detail. It looks like Geraint doesn't understand and Rubinart looks very worried)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
So a girl from the future helped Feder attain a complete jewel and he created the Red Dragon Nest...? This is too absurd to be true... Well, I've done something similar back in the days so humans could have done the same 50 years from now... (Rubinart still has a hard time swallowing the truth)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Damn, then we don't have much time.
Hey, kid! Can you fly here? How long do you think it would take you?
(Rubinart picks up the map from the floor and points to an island)

$Geraint$
Don't call me a kid, my name is Geraint! By the way, how do I get there when you didn't lift the curse on me...
I apologised but you didn't accept my apology too… It would take me five days if you lift the curse...
(Geraint glances at Rubinart)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…(Rubinart fumbles to find a way to answer him)……Oh right, the curse! Erm... I just... lifted the curse so you can go. {user_nick} can't fly and I don't have a body so I can't go! You're the only one we can depend on, hahaha. We need to confirm whether the nest has really been created to come up with a plan.

$Geraint$
Is it really lifted?
(Geraint clenches his fist and opens it up like he can't believe it)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Of course it is, it must have been lifted long ag... Ehem, I mean... I lifted it as soon as I accepted your apology. Now, go on. Wow, can you imagine I'm asking for a favour from an Ancient Dragon? I'm sure you'd be the first Ancient Dragon who's kind and brave enough to do something for a Chaos Dragon...

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9568_qu_06.ogg}
…(Geraint suddenly becomes proud)
All right! I'll go. Hey you, don't die while I'm away!

$Geraint$
...(He's concentrating on his breathing)

$Geraint$
(Geraint disappeared in the blink of an eye. Looks like his powers are really back.)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
… (Rubinart shakes his head in amazement) What happened in that short span of time...? No... What have you done to him to make him so obedient? Did you bully him with your hidden powers or something?

${user_nick}$
...(Tell him exactly what you told Geraint just now)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That was the only thing I could say.</html>
<html>I have no intention to die so easily.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_07.ogg}
…(Rubinart's face stiffens)
Hmm... It's good that he changed but... Why did you promise him that you won't die? Isn't that a little too dangerous? How would the other person feel if that promise is broken?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
… (Rubinart sighs quietly) You are going to fight Feder soon. He's the conqueror who used to rule this world and he's a Red Dragon now. You shouldn't have made such promises so easily. You don't know what might happen.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
But there's nothing we can do about what's already been done. Shall I explain about my nest now? If the nest has been completed, Ancient Dragons will become powerless when they enter the nest. I've put some spells so that Ancients kept out. Of course, the ones who are not qualified can't even enter my nest too.

${user_nick}$
…What?!

${user_nick}$
…Then how about me?! My heart is a fragment of Ancient Dragon's jewel!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
What?! You?!(Rubinart stares at you like he's shocked and shouts)
Aha!! Indeed!! I knew this could be possible! I knew I was right! Even a small fragment can make you live like a human, though you may not be recognised as a dragon!! Mine turned out to be a little sloppy only because I tried it for the first time!! Hahaha!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Er... Oops.(Rubinart covers his mouth)
Forget what I said. I just tried a few experiments using the dragon's jewel too. If not, how could I have given half of my jewel to Feder so cleanly?

${user_nick}$
…What?! Did you make someone like me...?!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I would have bragged about it to everyone if it turned out to be like you.
My creation was a failure which was incomplete. I don't even know if he still exists... I guess he would have died on his own. I would feel better if he died.

${user_nick}$
What?! It's true he was just a man-made creature but how can you say that!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Hey why are you making a fuss about it? It's me who made him so I can do whatever I want with him. He wouldn't have a life if it wasn't for me.
Erm... let's drop the topic. Ancient's fragment, you're soft-hearted so you may be sensitive about this topic. We have more urgent things to care about. Besides, you're good enough so you don't have to worry.

${user_nick}$
(I feel a sudden burst of feelings. Is this how Chaos Dragons think? Or is it just that Rubinart is evil? But... what he said is true. If I make him my enemy because of this, I can't win Feder... Though I want to scold him, I have to suppress my anger...)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(He stares at you again and shuts his mouth)
Hmm, right. I think I should tell you too... Give me your hand for a while.

${user_nick}$
…??
(The moment you reach out your hand, Rubinart presses against your palm. His sharp nail cuts your skin and blood starts to drip. Rubinart dips his finger into the drop of blood and he... tastes it?!!?)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Gee, what are you saying? It's clear now. The fundamentals didn't change so is it still considered fortunate...
Are you going to tell me your story later, {user_nick}?
(Rubinart looks at you with frightening eyes)

${user_nick}$
…? (All he did was call my name but I get chills down my spine... It's strange... Did I hear him call my name like this before...?)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…! Wait, I think we have a guest. Let's talk about that later.

$Velskud${sound:npc_Velskud_9568_qu_01.ogg}
…What's happening? Is that... Chaos Dragon?
(Velskud draws his sword)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_08.ogg}
And are you the one who inherited the Ancient Dragon's jewel? You were not a dragon to begin with.
I can smell Argenta from you. Besides, it's not one but... two…?
Were you Argenta's boyfriend…(the moment Velskud hears this, his face turns black)... I guess not.

$Velskud${sound:npc_Velskud_9568_qu_02.ogg}
…I'm not going to fall for your cheap provocations. I want some explanations, {user_nick}.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_09.ogg}
Same here. You smell like Argenta and I can even smell Feder from you. Who is he? Tell me everything you know, {user_nick}.

${user_nick}$
(It would be good if they just took the initiative to introduce themselves to each other... But you still explain it to them as much as you can. Your explanatory skills seem to be improving with much practice recently)

$Velskud${sound:npc_Velskud_9568_qu_03.ogg}
…He's Red Dragon's soul and Feder's old friend? Besides, he gave his jewel to Feder…?! What a fool!!
(Velskud's voice is laden with anger)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_10.ogg}
Calling a good friend who trusted his comrade to fulfill his dreams a fool is not what an Ancient Dragon would normally say.
Besides, you were Feder's old subordinate and his experimental subject... He experimented with his subordinate...? Feder really changed a lot... He used to hate that kind of thing... (Rubinart presses his forhead with his hands like he's upset)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_11.ogg}
I'm not the one you should be angry at. You should be angry at Feder who betrayed you and your stupid self for being too weak to escape the lab for 50 years. Don't try to shift the blame on me, Velskud. You still didn't manage to get rid of your foolish human feelings even after eating up Argenta's jewel?

$Velskud${sound:npc_Velskud_9568_qu_04.ogg}
What…?!(Velskud grabs his sword tightly)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_12.ogg}
Give up!! It looks like you're barely comfortable with Silver Dragon's huge jewel. If you try using the power you can't even control, innocent {user_nick} who's near you might die.

$Velskud${sound:npc_Velskud_9568_qu_05.ogg}
What…?!!!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_13.ogg}
(Rubinart sneers) Know your place, you're nothing but a dragon that has just been born, Velskud. But it's good that you're here. We were discussing about the spell on the Red Dragon Nest. I didn't know my spells that keep out stupid Ancient Dragons from my nest would act as a problem now.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_14.ogg}
We need to weaken the jewel to lift the spell. Then fighting with Feder would be the only way to do that.
Besides, it's a nest so only the qualified ones can enter. But the only one I can give the qualifications to is {user_nick}. So it will turn out to be a one on one battle between {user_nick} and Feder.

$Velskud${sound:npc_Velskud_9568_qu_06.ogg}
What?!! Do you think that's possible? That trash just returned from Monolith and now has to fight Feder alone?!
Do you think it's easy to kill Feder? Even Argenta had a hard time fighting him!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_15.ogg}
Who said anything about killing him? I just need the spell to be lifted. It's the jewel that's keeping the spell. When it's lifted, you and Geraint can enter the nest and the three of you can work together to do something. I'll give {user_nick} the power to enter the nest.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Don't expect me to help anyone else to enter the nest.
I'm nothing but a soul now, so if I use up my powers that's the end for me.
Or maybe you wish I would disappear, Ancient Dragon. Aww, that noble mission of yours...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_16.ogg}
Oh no!! (Rubinart shouts exaggeratedly) We have no time for this, Velskud! I didn't explain anything about the spell to Geraint just now because he left in such a haste! What if he... hurts himself by ramming into the Nest? Oh, you were originally a human so maybe you don't care even if a dragon dies...?

$Velskud${sound:npc_Velskud_9568_qu_07.ogg}
You...!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_17.ogg}
You don't want to waste your time arguing with me here too, don't you?
It would be too slow for us to chase after Geraint. I hope you're able to at least move quickly...
Well, you don't need much power for that.

$Velskud${sound:npc_Velskud_9568_qu_08.ogg}
You despicable trash...!!!
(Velskud snarls angrily and disappears. It looks like he's planning to follow Geraint...)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Trash? Another rude youngster with a foul mouth! Hmph, I mentioned about the little kid to test him but I didn't expect him to buy it so easily. Geraint is not a dimwit so he wouldn't bang into the Nest blindly. Both you and Velskud are worried for nothing.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Well, I don't like such guys. If I had to choose between him and Geraint, I would rather choose Geraint a hundred times over. Anyway, what was Argenta thinking? Didn't she know how powerful her own jewel is? How can she give that to a human? Besides, he has not one but two jewels!(Rubinart frowns)

${user_nick}$
But Velskud is strong. He wasn't eaten up by the Black Dragon's jewel too...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(She must have trusted him, it must be.)</html>
<html>(It can't be that she wanted to give him pain.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Black Dragon? You can't compare the Ancients' counterfeit creation with the real thing. Silver Dragon's jewel is... a jewel that contains more than half the power of Ancient Dragon. Did Argenta trust him too much or did she want to inflict pain on him? Whatever the case, it's none of my business.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Being eaten up by the jewel is the worst scenario, but he still wouldn't be able to escape from the jewel's influence. His personality will change and his appearance may become mutated in a serious case. Of course, he won't turn into a pretty woman like Argenta though... He may look more and more like a dragon... On top of that, his memory might be affected too... It has all the possibilities of bad complications. Of course, what I said were all possibilities, but anyways...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
It would be dangerous to take the jewel out of him now since it started to take its place... I should cancel what I said just now. We can't depend on the weak Ancient kid or the unstable Velskud. The combined attack of two Ancient Dragons should remain as a last resort. Things may become more complicated when they try to fight Feder...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>For Argenta who died protecting this world...</html>
<html>Even if I die, the world still has them.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…But that means you really have to fight Feder alone until the end... Damn... I don't recommend it... It's too dangerous. You might not come out alive.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_18.ogg}
(Rubinart smiles again... but his smile sends a chill down your spine...)
You know, I really like you... There's nothing more bothersome and terrifying than someone who is risking his or her life, whether you're weak or strong. Ah... That's making me excited... It makes me feel like running wild again... Haha, sometimes I feel like rampaging and setting things ablaze...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's not a burden. I'm just bearing my responsibility.</html>
<html>There are many people fighting for this world. I'm just one of them.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_19.ogg}
Haha, don't be so frightened. It's been ages since I last did such things. I'm more worried about your future. This is like what happened to Argenta and Feder. It's funny how one adventurer is burdened with the fate of this world.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It would hurt Geraint so I won't.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
That's the attitude. Let's do our best and not get noticed by the two Ancient Dragons.
But would it really be all right for you? You promised Geraint that you won't die. You can still back out. That's what humans are good at.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9568_qu_20.ogg}
Ah... I finally met another human who impresses me so much! Only if all the humans were like you, I would have flourished Lunascent a few thousand years more. You have manners and patience, yet you also have the strong will to achieve your goals. I really like you. I understand now why Iona chose you even when he had to give up his life.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Though my soul is not as strong as Iona's, I'll help you with my life too... You don't have to worry about entering the nest, {user_nick}. I'll help you. Though it's a pity that I can help only you...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Red light appears around him)
And one more thing... It's time I left this cave. Even though I will disappear soon, it would be more helpful for you if I stayed close to you. Don't you agree?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
It's about time I left this cave that Feder gave me... I'll be fighting against him now. I feel sad to say goodbye to Gershel who will be taking care of this place forever even when I'm gone...(Rubinart smiles)Let's go if you've made up your mind. Go and report to the ones who gave you the mission first.

$Terrence Terramai$
You're back! Are you all right? You came back so quickly. Did anything happen to you...?
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

${user_nick}$
Yes, I'm fine. Besides, I've found out where Feder is.

$Terrence Terramai$
What?! Really? Wait... (Terramai looks around)
Talk to me a while later. I should let the others know...
(Talk to Terramai a while later to continue with the next quest)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I'll be near Anu Arendel at a place that smells like a dragon.
Though I'm nothing but a weak soul dwelling in a book, you don't have to worry about me. Now go to the Royal Castle!
Tell them you've found where Feder is.
(Report to Terrence Terramai inside the Royal Castle)

journal.title: Belated Reconciliation 1
journal.contents:
Go to the Passage of Broken Recollections with Geraint to meet Rubinart.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Rubinart)
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart at the Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.todo_msg: Quest has been added. Go and meet Rubinart at the Passage of Broken Recollections.

journal.title: Belated Reconciliation 2
journal.contents:
It looks like Geraint's apology was accepted.
Geraint left on Rubinart's request to check on the Red Dragon Nest.
Talk to Rubinart a little more.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Rubinart)
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart at the Passage of Broken Recollections

journal.title: Belated Reconciliation 3
journal.contents:
It looks like Rubinart is worried about the promise you made to Geraint.
Since Velskud has appeared, talk to him.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Velskud)
journal.destination: Talk to Velskud at the Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.todo_msg: Velskud has appeared. Talk to Velskud.

journal.title: Belated Reconciliation 4
journal.contents:
Come to think of it, Geraint didn't hear anything about the spell on the Red Dragon Nest before he left... After finding out about it, Velskud hurriedly left to get Geraint. You're once again alone with Rubinart. Talk to him.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Rubinart)
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart at the Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.todo_msg: Velskud went to bring Geraint back. Talk to Rubinart.

journal.title: Belated Reconciliation 5
journal.contents:
You've found out about the Red Dragon Nest… and devised a plan.
Now go and report to Terramai.

Saint Haven - Saint Haven Royal Castle (Terrence Terramai)
journal.destination: Talk to Terrence Terramai in the Royal Castle
journal.todo_msg: Let Terrence Terramai know about what happened.
